snippet: Relatives of those who were on Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 have spent the past year in a limbo of grief, anger and hope. But to them, the fact that the world may have moved on is worse.
abstract: Ghyslain Wattrelos and several other people who had relatives aboard Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 continue to seek answers about flight's disappearance in March of 2014; not satisfied with official explanation that disappearance was an accident, they are convinced there is more to story and say they plan to offer large reward to entice potential whistleblowers to speak up.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of those who were on Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 have spent the past year in a limbo of grief, anger and hope. But to them, the fact that the world may have moved on is worse.

headline.main: Families of Flight 370 Victims Fear Silence as World Moves On
headline.print_headline: Mystery of Missing Plane Keeps Families in Limbo
